3237732066846131594.Text: Alchemists, apothecaries, and healers, as well as general merchants, sell commercial potions. These potions are easy and reliable, but costly. If you have training and skill in alchemy, and the necessary apparatus and ingredients, you can make your own homemade potions in the field. The eleven kinds of potions are: cure potions, restore potions, fortify potions, resist potions, aquatic potions, mysticism potions, alteration potions, illusion potions, detect potions, shield potions, and toxic potions.
